sqlMap.select: SELECT tc.entity_id as CONSUMER_ID, TC.CONSUMER_NAME, TSP.MCHNT_CD, TM.MERCHANT_NAME, SUBSTR(TSP.PRI_ACCT_NO,3,LENGTH(TSP.PRI_ACCT_NO)-2) AS CARD_NO, TSP.TRANS_AT_SGL/100 as TRANS_AT_SGL, TSP.TRANS_NM, TSP.TRANS_FEE_SGL/100 as TRANS_FEE_SGL, TSP.TERM_ID, TSP.TXN_SEQ_NO, to_char(to_date(TSP.SETTLE_DT,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')||' '||TSP.TRANS_TIME as SETTLE_DT FROM TB_SETTLE_TRANS_PRE TSP,TB_MERCHANT TM,TB_CONSUMER TC WHERE TSP.MCHNT_CD=TM.MERCHANT_CODE AND TSP.SETTLE_FLAG='1' and tm.father_entity_id=tc.entity_id and tc.entity_id=#consumerId# and to_date(TSP.settle_dt, 'yyyyMMdd') >= to_date(#startDate#, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(TSP.settle_dt, 'yyyyMMdd') <= to_date(#endDate#, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
